item.title: 7 Things Tolkien Said About Life 7 Things Tolkien Said About Life â€” 7 Comments
item.description: J.R.R. Tolkien wrote many books, including the Middle-earth stories. He is particularly known for The Lord of the Rings and like many stories of an epic journey, LOTR lets us take away lessons we can apply to our life.
